医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
医疗制造趋势如何演变：从性能测试到 3D 视觉在本次采访中，News Medical 与 Ascential Technologies 讨论了医疗制造趋势的演变以及用户如何保持领先于未来趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/How-medical-manufacturing-trends-are-evolving-From-performance-testing-to-3D-vision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231220/How-medical-manufacturing-trends-are-evolving-From-performance-testing-to-3D-vision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f9746c2-001b-4544-b0f8-427237367b40 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 05:13:00 -0500 How medical manufacturing trends are evolving: From performance testing to 3D vision
糖尿病药物可以帮助女性避免戒烟后体重增加发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Nutrition Prevention & Health 上的一项临床试验数据二次分析发现，糖尿病药物度拉鲁肽 (Trulicity) 可以显着降低女性戒烟后体重大幅增加的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Diabetes-drug-may-help-women-avoid-weight-gain-after-quitting-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Diabetes-drug-may-help-women-avoid-weight-gain-after-quitting-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99b89de3-d443-4fb8-8c51-fbd8f28ab782 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:56:21 -0500 Diabetes drug may help women avoid weight gain after quitting smoking
每日补充甜菜根汁可改善慢性阻塞性肺病患者的血压和步行距离今天（周三）发表在《欧洲呼吸杂志》上的一项研究显示，慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 患者每日补充甜菜根汁为期 12 周，可降低血压并改善患者在六分钟内行走的距离。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Daily-beetroot-juice-supplement-improves-blood-Pressure-and-walking-distance-in-COPD-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Daily-beetroot-juice-supplement-improves-blood-Pressure-and-walking-distance-in-COPD-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b135f3ea-80eb-41cb-a6dd-b14c59ec6c45 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:50:31 -0500 Daily beetroot juice supplement improves blood pressure and walking distance in COPD patients
使用降血脂他汀类药物可减缓阿尔茨海默氏痴呆症的进展降血脂他汀类药物可以减缓阿尔茨海默病的进展，至少对某些患者来说是这样。这是卡罗林斯卡学院领导的一项新研究的结果，该研究发表在《阿尔茨海默病研究与治疗》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Use-of-blood-fat-lowering-statins-linked-to-slower-progression-of-Alzheimers-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Use-of-blood-fat-lowering-statins-linked-to-slower-progression-of-Alzheimers-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b146a187-9578-482c-a71d-aa562b5fae5b Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:44:31 -0500 Use of blood fat-lowering statins linked to slower progression of Alzheimer's dementia
UMSOM 审查发现，广泛使用大麻与精神疾病增加有关根据马里兰大学医学院 (UMSOM) 最近发表在《新英格兰医学杂志》上的一篇新评论文章，大麻的广泛使用及其效力的增加与大麻相关的精神疾病的增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Widespread-cannabis-use-linked-to-increase-in-psychiatric-disorders-UMSOM-review-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Widespread-cannabis-use-linked-to-increase-in-psychiatric-disorders-UMSOM-review-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cbd854e-baad-448b-aef4-7dda1d55cf8c Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:33:01 -0500 Widespread cannabis use linked to increase in psychiatric disorders, UMSOM review finds
非洲超过 100 万人死亡与抗菌素耐药性有关在世卫组织非洲区域，超过 105 万人死亡与抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 有关，其中 25 万人因抗菌素耐药性死亡，构成了前所未有的健康威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Over-1-million-deaths-linked-to-antimicrobial-resistance-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Over-1-million-deaths-linked-to-antimicrobial-resistance-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0e19e55-2b0d-4a27-b096-e58be7bcede7 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:13:57 -0500 Over 1 million deaths linked to antimicrobial resistance in Africa
研究揭示细胞珠蛋白在发育过程中纤毛运动和器官定位中的关键作用研究表明，细胞珠蛋白 (cygb2) 在发育过程中调节纤毛运动和器官侧向性方面发挥着至关重要的作用，凸显了其在 NO 信号传导和纤毛功能中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-reveals-cytoglobins-pivotal-role-in-cilia-movement-and-organ-positioning-during-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-reveals-cytoglobins-pivotal-role-in-cilia-movement-and-organ-positioning-during-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba8f7a7d-3220-461b-a478-0addf3a00125 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 22:26:00 -0500 Study reveals cytoglobin's pivotal role in cilia movement and organ positioning during development
医疗保健领域的人工智能：一把双刃剑？研究揭示了对诊断准确性的影响研究调查了人工智能对临床医生诊断准确性的影响，揭示人工智能解释并不能显着减轻有偏见的人工智能模型的有害影响，强调需要在临床环境中仔细验证人工智能工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-in-healthcare-A-double-edged-sword-Study-reveals-impact-on-diagnostic-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-in-healthcare-A-double-edged-sword-Study-reveals-impact-on-diagnostic-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e8ef958-7b9a-49a2-8a7a-3a8746a1d7c5 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 22:15:00 -0500 AI in healthcare: A double-edged sword? Study reveals impact on diagnostic accuracy
胚胎免疫传感器可能是创建患者来源的造血干细胞的关键帮助识别和对抗细菌感染的微生物传感器在造血干细胞的发育中也发挥着关键作用，这为创造患者来源的造血干细胞从而消除骨髓移植的需要提供了宝贵的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Embryonic-immune-sensor-could-key-to-creating-病人-衍生-blood-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Embryonic-immune-sensor-could-key-to-creating-病人-衍生-blood-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63139aaf-2f53-4f49-a71e-fe23f21c7670 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 22:04:49 -0500 Embryonic immune sensor could key to creating patient-derived blood stem cells
子宫内膜癌发病率惊人上升，尤其是黑人女性这些数字是严峻且令人深感不安的。子宫内膜癌 -;它在子宫内膜（子宫）内发育，有时称为子宫癌 -；美国的病例呈上升趋势，1987年，每年有35,000例病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Endometrial-cancer-rates-rising-alarmingly-pspecially-among-Black-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Endometrial-cancer-rates-rising-alarmingly-pspecially-among-Black-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a382a2a7-cb4a-4e28-9fe7-89a2a426de98 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 21:56:34 -0500 Endometrial cancer rates rising alarmingly, particularly among Black women
